p1: By submitting this claim, I confirm that:

li1.1: the information I have given is complete and correct
li1.2: this is the only claim I have made for these costs
li1.3: I am only claiming for agreed support
li1.4: I will let DWP know if my circumstances change whilst I am getting Access to work

p2: I understand and agree that DWP may recover any money wrongly paid to me because I did not either:

li2.2: report a change in my circumstances

p3: I understand if I give wrong or incomplete information, or I do not report changes as they happen, I may:

li3.2: need to pay a financial penalty
li3.3: have my Access to Work grant reduced or stopped
